message.body: midge she said she dont know if they can get anymore jackets. you only wanted black right ?
not pink or any different colors
Yea she only wanted black. Ok that's alright ill grt her something else
okaay. i just dont wanna hold u up yaknow they keep sayig they are gonna talk to the guy who can get it. but if they do get it ill grab it. its just that they
all sold out fast and now the uggs are coming in
That's fine. Worst case grab it and Steph will buy it for herself bec that's really cheap. Ill just get her something else instead so no worries... thanks tho
okaaay ! loveeeyou! and im almost home thank god
